column8: 你们去买菜的时候，我和镇子上的人们讲了，住得很远的那些亲戚，我也写了信，几天以后他们也会知道。
column9: While you two were out shopping, I told the folks in town. I even wrote letters to those relatives who live far away—in a few days, they’ll know too.

column3: avgV1.4弥利亚姆大型支线上篇_AvgDialog_C_M.csv
column8: 附近那些从小看着你长大的叔叔阿姨，都为你高兴，送了好多吃的喝的过来。
column9: All the aunts and uncles who’ve watched you grow up are happy for you. They sent over so much food and drink.

column3: avgV1.4弥利亚姆大型支线上篇_AvgDialog_C_M.csv
column8: 啊对，还有城里那个祭司，听说你是被主祭挑选出来的，过来主动找我说话，态度可好了！
column9: As for the priest in our town, he came to talk to me after he heard that you were chosen by the High Priest. He was so polite!

column3: avgV1.4弥利亚姆大型支线上篇_AvgDialog_C_M.csv
column8: 只是个小事情……没必要告诉这么多人吧……
column9: It's not a big deal... there's no need to tell so many people...

column3: avgV1.4弥利亚姆大型支线上篇_AvgDialog_C_M.csv
column8: 才不是小事！姐姐要是当了祭司，就能赚好多好多钱，还可以找人来帮我扫地……
column9: It IS a big deal! If Sis becomes a priest, she’ll earn lots and lots of money, and she can even hire someone to help me sweep the floor...

column3: avgV1.4弥利亚姆大型支线上篇_AvgDialog_C_M.csv
column8: 可别瞎说，萨拉。祭司是个神圣的职业，当祭司可不是为了这些。
column9: Don’t say such things, Sarah. The priesthood is a sacred calling. One doesn’t take it up for such reasons.

column3: avgV1.4弥利亚姆大型支线上篇_AvgDialog_C_M.csv
column8: 那祭司是干嘛的？
column9: Then what does a priest do?

column3: avgV1.4弥利亚姆大型支线上篇_AvgDialog_C_M.csv
column8: 祭司的使命……这就要从很早之前说起了。这是每个利莫里亚人，都应该熟知的故事，
column9: The duty of a priest… now that goes back a very long time. It’s a story every Lemurian ought to know.

column3: avgV1.4弥利亚姆大型支线上篇_AvgDialog_C_M.csv
column8: 伊诺斯抱起萨拉，把她放在自己腿上，抚摸着她的头。
column9: Enos picks up Sarah in his arms, places her on his lap, and softly strokes her head.

column3: avgV1.4弥利亚姆大型支线上篇_AvgDialog_C_M.csv
column8: 利莫里亚，有着辉煌的历史与璀璨的文明。神明的力量庇佑着这个国家，赐予我们无尽的幸福与安宁。
column9: Our country, Lemuria, boasts a glorious history as a shining civilization. The power of God protects this land, granting us everlasting happiness and peace.

column3: avgV1.4弥利亚姆大型支线上篇_AvgDialog_C_M.csv
column8: 这里没有天灾，没有病痛，每个人都有享之不尽的食物与美酒。即使是逝去的人，在神明的帮助下，也能与生者团聚。
column9: There are no calamities here, no disease. Everyone enjoys endless food and fine wine. Even the departed, aided by God, may reunite with the living.

column3: avgV1.4弥利亚姆大型支线上篇_AvgDialog_C_M.csv
column8: 可不知道从什么时候开始，这里的人们便不再能听到神明的声音。天灾变得越来越频繁……
column9: But at some point, our people could no longer hear the voice of God. Calamities became more and more frequent...

column3: avgV1.4弥利亚姆大型支线上篇_AvgDialog_C_M.csv
column8: 我们的国家被漫无边际的海水包围着，从来没有人能够从这里走出去。只有神明，才能改变这一切。
column9: Our country is surrounded by boundess seas—no one has ever been able to leave. Only God can change this.

column3: avgV1.4弥利亚姆大型支线上篇_AvgDialog_C_M.csv
column8: 而我们的王，是唯一能够与神沟通的人。王会聆听神谕，重新为我们带来神的恩泽。
column9: And our King is the only one who can communicate with God. The King hears God's oracles, and will once more bring us His blessings.

column3: avgV1.4弥利亚姆大型支线上篇_AvgDialog_C_M.csv
column8: 到那个时候，所有天灾都会消失，死去的亲人重获新生，我们会永远在这片土地上安居……利莫里亚，将重新成为完美的神国！
column9: When that time comes, all calamities will cease, the departed will return to life, and we will live on this land in eternal peace... Lemuria will once again become the perfect Divine Realm!
